attributes.action: End Sectarian Division in the UK
attributes.additional_details: We the undersigned sincerely wish for the children of the nation to be educated together so that they can learn and grow united. We therefore wish to see an end to state funding for all faith based schools, in order to actively discourage the sectarian division of the UK population at the taxpayers expense.

rejection.details: The Department for Education is responsible for schools in England only.
